Hi Edgar,

> I can't seem to find registration information, I'm curious abo=
ut the costs. 

The organizers just told me that the registration informati=
on will be online soon.
I think the prices will be similar to last year's.
=

> Also, do you have to register for ICWE2016 in order to attend the WS-RES=
T2016 workshop by itself?

It will be possible to register for one day or t=
hree days or four days.

Best,

Ruben
